recipe_name: Easy Fish Tacos with Mango-Pineapple Slaw
ingredients: 1 pound cod fillets, 1 tablespoon lemon juice,   salt and ground black pepper to taste,   +   1/2 cup red wine vinegar,   +   1/4 cup reduced-fat mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon white sugar, 1 tablespoon salt, 1 tablespoon ground black pepper, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 3 cups shredded cabbage,   +   1/2 cup chopped fresh mango,   +   1/2 cup chopped fresh pineapple,   +   1/2 cup chopped red onion,   +   1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 1  fresh jalapeno pepper, chopped, 8 (8 inch) flour tortillas
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Cholesterol 27mg 9%, Sodium 1308mg 57%, Total Carbohydrate 38g 14%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 16g, Vitamin C 24mg 118%, Calcium 100mg 8%, Iron 3mg 14%, Potassium 338mg 7%
